faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers about our services and guarantee.

items.q: How does your money-back guarantee work?
items.a: Our Credit Service comes with a money-back guarantee. If we don't deliver results, you get 100% back.

items.q: What kind of debt resolution do you handle?
items.a: We specialize in fast-tracked debt resolution for the IRS, State, and student loan defaults.

items.q: Do you offer business credit services?
items.a: Yes, we offer both business credit building to establish your business profile and credit tradelines for personal and business use.

items.q: How long does credit repair typically take?
items.a: Most clients see improvements within 30-45 days; significant results are common by 90 days.

items.q: Is credit repair legal?
items.a: Absolutely. The Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA) gives you the right to dispute inaccurate information on your credit reports. We exercise that right on your behalf.

items.q: Do you offer services in Spanish?
items.a: Sí. We have bilingual counselors and offer all services in Spanish (Hablamos Español).

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our real estate and insurance services

items.q: What types of real estate services do you offer?
items.a: We provide comprehensive real estate services, including Real Property Management, Commercial and Residential Leasing, and full agent services through Messiah Mason.

items.q: Who is your real estate agent?
items.a: We partner with Messiah Mason, a dedicated real estate agent, to handle all your buying and selling needs.

items.q: What kind of insurance do you provide?
items.a: As licensed agents, we offer Life, Accident & Sickness, Property, and Casualty insurance to cover all your personal and professional needs.

items.q: What is Real Property Management?
items.a: It is our comprehensive service for managing your rental properties, including leasing, maintenance, and rent collection, allowing you to be a hands-off investor.

items.q: Do you offer bilingual services?
items.a: Absolutely! We provide full services in both English and Spanish (Hablamos Español) to ensure clear communication and understanding throughout the entire process.

items.q: Do you offer military discounts?
items.a: Yes! We're proud to offer VIP services and exclusive discounts for Active Duty, Retired, & Reservists as a thank you for their service.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about business credit building and our services.

items.q: How long does it take to build business credit?
items.a: You can start seeing tradelines within 30-60 days; strong profiles typically in 3-6 months.

items.q: What's the difference between business credit and personal credit?
items.a: Business credit is tied to your EIN, not SSN; it doesn’t appear on personal reports and protects personal assets.

items.q: What are Credit Trade Lines?
items.a: We offer both Personal and Business tradelines. These are established lines of credit that can be added to your profile to boost your credit history, age, and mix, often resulting in a faster score increase.

items.q: How much credit can I qualify for?
items.a: Depends on revenue, time in business, and profile strength; clients often secure $25,000–$500,000+.

items.q: Do you offer services in Spanish?
items.a: Sí. We have bilingual counselors and offer all services in Spanish (Hablamos Español).

items.q: Do you offer military discounts?
items.a: Yes! We're proud to offer VIP services and exclusive discounts for Active Duty, Retired, & Reservists.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about business formation, compliance, and our corporate services.

items.q: What's the difference between an LLC and Corporation?
items.a: LLCs offer flexibility in management and tax treatment with simpler compliance requirements. Corporations provide stronger liability protection and easier access to investment capital but have more complex tax and compliance obligations.

items.q: How long does business formation take?
items.a: Most business formations are completed within 5-10 business days including document preparation, state filing, and EIN registration. Expedited services available.

items.q: Do I need a registered agent?
items.a: Yes, all businesses formed in GA, AL, and TX must have a registered agent with a physical address in the state. We provide professional registered agent services.

items.q: What ongoing compliance is required?
items.a: Requirements vary by state and entity type but typically include annual filings, maintaining corporate records, and paying required fees. Our compliance services handle all ongoing requirements.

items.q: Do you handle document preparation?
items.a: Yes, we specialize in document preparation for business, financial, and immigration needs.

items.q: What documents will I receive after formation?
items.a: Certificate of Formation/Articles of Incorporation, EIN confirmation, Operating Agreement or Bylaws, and other corporate documents. Corporate kit on request.

items.q: Do you offer bilingual services?
items.a: Sí. Full bilingual support in English and Spanish (Hablamos Español) for all corporate services.

items.q: Do you offer military discounts?
items.a: Yes! Active Duty, Retired, & Reservists will always receive VIP service and discounts.

stillQuestions.title: Still Have Questions?
stillQuestions.text: Our business formation experts are ready to help you make the right decisions for your business.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to the most common questions about our franchise opportunity.

items.q: What is the total investment required?
items.a: The total investment is $95,000 including fees, setup, marketing, and working capital. Financing available up to 70%.

items.q: How long does it take to become profitable?
items.a: Most franchisees reach profitability within 6-9 months with our training and launch support.

items.q: Do I need prior experience in financial services?
items.a: Not required. Our 8-week training covers everything you need.

items.q: What ongoing fees are required?
items.a: 6% royalty and 2% marketing fee support training, tech, and franchise services.

items.q: Can I operate from home initially?
items.a: Yes. Many start from home and later transition to a commercial location with our guidance.

items.q: What support do I receive after opening?
items.a: Dedicated coach, 24/7 helpdesk, reviews, ongoing training, marketing, and peer network.

items.q: How large is my protected territory?
items.a: Minimum 50,000 people; typical 75,000–150,000.

items.q: Can I own multiple territories?
items.a: Yes. Right of first refusal on adjacent territories and support for multi-unit development.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our business tax and accounting services.

items.q: What business structures do you handle?
items.a: We are accountants/CPAs for both Individuals and Businesses, including sole proprietorships, partnerships, LLCs, S-Corps, and C-Corps.

items.q: Do you provide year-round support?
items.a: Yes, we provide year-round support, including quarterly tax prep and filing and ongoing accounting services.

items.q: Can you help with multi-state tax issues?
items.a: Yes, we are Tax Agents and Preparers for Federal and all states, handling all multi-state compliance.

items.q: What accounting software do you support?
items.a: We support all major accounting software and can provide setup and training as part of our Accounting Services.

items.q: How do you handle payroll tax compliance?
items.a: Our Payroll Services include withholdings, deposits, quarterly filings, annual reports, and unemployment taxes.

items.q: What if I get audited by the IRS?
items.a: We provide full audit representation and specialize in fast-tracked debt resolution with the IRS and State authorities.

items.q: Do you offer bilingual services?
items.a: Sí, (Hablamos Español) full services are available in Spanish.

items.q: What are your fees for business tax preparation?
items.a: Our fees are transparent. We offer 40% off accounting contracts (excluding app fee) and $70 for tax referrals. Contact us for a free quote.

hero.description: Founded in 2007, JB Networking Systems LLC provides comprehensive, expert financial solutions. Discover how we became a trusted full-service financial network across three states.

history.title: About JBNS
history.p1: JB Networking Systems LLC AND all partner companies, was founded in 2007. With several years' experience in immigration, accounting, financial services, tax preparation, both individual and business.
history.p2: Our Credit Service is another one of the company's expertise with a money back guarantee. We have fast tracked to Debt resolution with the IRS, State, and student loan debts as default management consultants and documents preparation.
history.p3: What started as a local tax preparation service in Georgia has grown into a full-service financial network spanning three states, serving thousands of individuals and businesses.
principles: Safeguard every client's financial assets with unwavering dedication
Maintain personal relationships in an increasingly digital world
Serve diverse communities with bilingual expertise (Hablamos Español)
Honor our military community with VIP service and recognition

timeline.title: Our Journey Through the Years
timeline.description: From a single office in Georgia to a multi-state financial network, here's how we've grown while maintaining our core values.

items.title: Company Founded
items.text: Established in Georgia with a focus on personal tax preparation, accounting, and immigration services.

items.title: Bilingual Services Launch
items.text: Introduced comprehensive Spanish-language services (Hablamos Español) for our community.

items.title: VIP Military Program Launch

items.title: 17 Years of Excellence
items.text: Continuing to grow while safeguarding assets with a personal touch.

mission.title: Our Mission & Core Values
mission.subtitle: Everything we do is guided by our commitment to safeguarding your assets while providing the personal touch that sets us apart.

mission.title: Making & Obtaining Goals
mission.text: As your financial consultant, I start by documenting your goals and then compare them to your current portfolio. I use proven investment strategies designed to meet your risk tolerance and stand up against market volatility. You can count on unbiased recommendations and impartial guidance based directly on your needs and goals.

vision.title: Building Strong & Solid Futures
vision.text: We're passionate about helping both companies and individuals with diversifying portfolios, managing assets, analyzing market trends, and reducing financial risk and tax risk. My goal? To safeguard the dreams you strive to achieve the assets you have worked so hard to accumulate.
